Title: Forever and a Day
Writer: Melissa Mae Chua (story), Melissa Mae Chua (screenplay), Carmi Raymundo (screenplay)
Actors: Sam Milby, KC Concepcion, Rayver Cruz, Matet De Leon
Plot: Eugene (Sam Milby) arrives in Bukidnon with only one intention: to forget his problems at work. But when he meets Raffy (KC Concepcion) and as they travel and go on ridiculous and ...
